description:
He appears in one episode only, but is enough to make an impact on the entire franchise.
Haka was a Sangheili of the Covenant Empire that served as a military assistant to the High Prophets during the early years of the alliance.
(from Halo Wikia)
Appears in Halo Legends episode "The Duel"
(from My Anime List)
name: Haka `Suukaree
